description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Thad with a comment about Mark Zuckerberg’s pathetic deference to Trump: I’ve said it before, but what’s even the point of having that level of wealth if you’re just going to debase yourself for somebody like Trump? For what will it profit a man […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
